cpa.schilduil
Class DynamicIPGetter

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--cpa.schilduil.DynamicIPGetter
public class DynamicIPGetter
extends java.lang.Object

This program gets an IP address from a web site and writes it to a structured file.

Use of this program

  -h
     prints this message
  -f <settings file>
     define a specific settings file (default is dynamicipgetter.ini)
  -s <URL> [<target file>]
     define a URL where to get the IP address and optionally the target file (default is ip.txt)
  -ip <ip address> [<target file>]
     defines the IP address and optionally the target file (default is ip.txt)
Website

http://www.schilduil.be/projects/DynamicIPGetter.php

This function opens up a HTTP connection to retrieve the IP number. It reads a maximum of 15 characters (xxx.xxx.xxx.xxx).
